name: strmid
description: Extract a range of characters from a string.

params_body.name: dest[]
params_body.description: The string to store the extracted characters in.

params_body.name: const source[]
params_body.description: The string from which to extract characters.

params_body.name: start
params_body.description: The position of the first character.

params_body.name: end
params_body.description: The position of the last character.

params_body.name: maxlength=sizeof dest
params_body.description: The length of the destination. (Will be the size of dest by default)

return_values: The number of characters stored in dest[]
related_fn:
strcmp: Compare two strings to check if they are the same.
 strfind: Search for a string in another string.
 strtok: Get the next 'token' (word/parameter) in a string.
 strdel: Delete part of a string.
 strins: Insert text into a string.
 strlen: Get the length of a string.
 strpack: Pack a string into a destination string.
 strval: Convert a string into an integer.
 strcat: Concatenate two strings into a destination reference.
